title: BTS’ V Drops ‘White Christmas’ Rendition | Billboard News
description: BTS’ V is in the holiday spirit as he dropped his rendition of “White Christmas” with Bing Crosby. Keep watching to hear a snippet of his version and to see what other BTS members have done for the holiday season!  Tetris Kelly: One of our favorite crooners is bringing the Christmas spirit. We’re discussing V’s […]
author: Katie Cao
excerpt: BTS’ V is in the holiday spirit as he dropped his rendition of “White Christmas” with Bing Crosby. Keep watching to see BTS has done for the holiday!
text: BTS’ V is in the holiday spirit as he dropped his rendition of “White Christmas” with Bing Crosby. Keep watching to hear a snippet of his version and to see what other BTS members have done for the holiday season!  Tetris Kelly: One of our favorite crooners is bringing the Christmas spirit. We’re discussing V’s new holiday track and some of the times BTS has brought the cheer. Just today, the new rendition of “White Christmas” dropped including Bing Crosby, V’s favorite jazz singer growing up. We love it. Our boys love this time of year. V previously released “Christmas Tree.” And who could forget the holiday version of their Hot 100 No.1 “Dynamite.” Jimin released “Christmas Love” and Jung Kook joined him for Christmas Day. For more on V’s new track and BTS holiday tracks… head to Billboard.com.
html:
BTS’ V is in the holiday spirit as he dropped his rendition of “White Christmas” with Bing Crosby. Keep watching to hear a snippet of his version and to see what other BTS members have done for the holiday season! 

Tetris Kelly:

One of our favorite crooners is bringing the Christmas spirit. We’re discussing V’s new holiday track and some of the times BTS has brought the cheer. Just today, the new rendition of “White Christmas” dropped including Bing Crosby, V’s favorite jazz singer growing up. We love it. Our boys love this time of year. V previously released “Christmas Tree.” And who could forget the holiday version of their Hot 100 No.1 “Dynamite.” Jimin released “Christmas Love” and Jung Kook joined him for Christmas Day. For more on V’s new track and BTS holiday tracks… head to Billboard.com.
